question:
The recent discoveries of unexploded World War II munitions buried just beneath houses and roads in European cities is very (i) ________, since one can easily imagine becoming a (ii) ________ of a war that ended decades ago.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
A. exhilarating
D. hero
B. disquieting
E.  martyr
C. demeaning
F. casualty
Show
Hide
